EmailTemplate.name: HT 2021 (1) Renewal First Notication
EmailTemplate.subject: HT Renewal 20XXXX to 20XXXX {!Case.Account} {!Case.Sales_Order_Number__c} {!Case.Case_Number__c} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Your NavDB Service is up for renewal. Honeywell hereby provides notice that the Navigation Data Base (NavDB) Update Service Agreement for Airborne Navigation Systems will automatically renew pursuant to Section 2, Term, Paragraph b of said agreement.
Kindly confirm the aircraft in your fleet with a Honeywell HT. The ACAS fleet reporting tool that Honeywell and the airlines use lists the following: xx xxxx
Honeywell kindly requests that you review the Service Parameters carefully and advise us of your acceptance or any necessary changes within seven (7) calendar days.
Thank you and Regards,
{!Case.OwnerFirstName}
Data Services
Account Management Representative(AMR)
email: dsa@honeywell.com
602-436-6739
For 24-Hour/7-Day technical support, please contact ATS (Aerospace Technical Support) at 855-808-6500 for within the United States and 602-365-6500 for outside the United States,Fax 1-602-365-3343, or email AeroTechSupport@honeywell.com
